Sentencas: This review article provides an overview of our recent studies of the direct oxidation of hydrocarbons in solid-oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Applications of heterogeneous catalysis in the direct oxidation of hydrocarbons in a solid-oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The use of a thermally stable, highly porous, yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) matrix, which allows for the optimization of the anode composition and catalytic properties, is described.
Titulo: Applications of heterogeneous catalysis in the direct oxidation of hydrocarbons in a solid-oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Studies of the direct oxidation of hydrocarbons using anodes composed of mixtures of YSZ, copper, ceria and samaria-doped ceria are also presented.
Titulo: Applications of heterogeneous catalysis in the direct oxidation of hydrocarbons in a solid-oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The results of these studies demonstrate that copper-ceria based anodes are active for the direct electrocatalytic oxidation of a wide range of hydrocarbons including alkanes, alkenes, and aromatics.
Titulo: Applications of heterogeneous catalysis in the direct oxidation of hydrocarbons in a solid-oxide fuel cell
